Tour du Rwanda Musanze - Nyamata

Etape : Musanze – Nyamata
Intera : Km 121.1
Isaha yo guhaguruka: 10:00
Umuvuduko witezwe: 42km /h

Umwanditsi : Ngabo Roben na Ishimwe Israel

Amafoto : Niyonzima Moïse

Uko isiganwa riri kugenda

13:38

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Ibihembo byatanzwe

Umwenda utangwa na Skol uhabwa uwegukanye agace: Przemysaw Kasperkiewicz (Delko Marseille Provence)

Umwenda w'Umuhondo utangwa na Minispoc uhabwa uri imbere ku rutonde rusange: Merhawi Kudus (Astana Pro Team)

Umwenda utangwa na Cogebanque uhabwa urusha abandi guterera imisozi: Mugisha Moise (Team Rwanda)

Umwenda w'urusha abandi Sprint utangwa na SP: Du Plooy Rohan (Pro-Touch)

Umwenda w'umukinnyi ukiri muto witwaye neza utangwa na Prime Insurance Ltd: Didier Munyaneza (Benediction Club)

Umwenda w'urusha abandi guhangana utangwa na Rwanda Tea: Pablo Torres Muiño (Interpro Cycling Academy)

Umwenda w'umunya-Afurika uri imbere uhembwa na RwandaAir: Merhawi Kudus (Astana Pro Team, Erythree)

Umwenda w'umunyarwanda uri imbere ku rutonde rusange utangwa na RDB: Didier Munyaneza (Benediction Club)

Ikipe yahize izindi yahembwe umwenda w'Inyange Industries: (Erythree)

13:21

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Uko bakurikiranye

1.Przemysaw Kasperkiewicz 02h49'57''
2.Pablo Torres Muiño 02h50'00''
3.Youcef Reguigui 02h50'01''
4.Mulubrhan Henok 02h50'01''
5.Trarieux Julien 02h50'01''

13:16

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Kasperkiewicz Przemyslaw ni muntu ki?

Uyu mukinnyi yavutse tariki 1 Werurwe 1994 avukira i Kalisz mu Mujyi wa kabiri munini kurusha indi muri Pologne inyuma ya Varsovie.

Mu 2014 nibwo yatangiye gusiganwa ku magare by'umwuga mu makipe y'iwabo; Bauknecht–Author yavuyemo mu 2016 ajya muri AWT–GreenWay yakiniye umwaka umwe mu 2017 ajya muri An Post–Chain Reaction mbere yo kwerekeza muri Quick-Step Floors aho yakoze igeragezwa ariko ntiyahirwa ngo afatwe muri iyi kipe ya World Tour. Byanze yahise asinyira Delko–Marseille Provence KTM yo mu Bufaransa akinira kugera ubu.

12:59

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

AGACE KA GATANDATU KA TOUR DU RWANDA 2019 KEGUKANYWE NA Kasperkiewicz Przemyslaw

Umunya-Pologne ukinira Delko Marseille Provence yegukanye agace ka gatandatu ka Tour du Rwanda. Asesekaye i Nyamata ari imbere asiga itsinda ry'abakinnyi umunani barimo Valens Ndayisenga

12:57

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Hasigaye ikilometero kimwe

Umuvuduko ni wose ku basatira umurongo wo gusorezaho

12:53

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Abasiganwa bari kuzamuka umusozi wa Karumuna

Mu gihe habura ibilometero 10 ngo siganwa risozwe, abakinnyi icyenda baracyari imbere. Gusa batangiye kugerageza gucomoka no gusiga abo bahanganye. Bashobora gusoza ari umwe umwe atari 'Sprint'.

12:32

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Batangiye kuzamuka ku Kicukiro, umuvuduko w'igikundi utangiye kwiyongera

Abasiganwa bagera i Gahanga bari imbere baraba bafite amahirwe yo gutsinda. Igikundi kizamutse Kicukiro ku muvuduko wa 42km/h. Ikinyuranyo bahise kigabanya. Ubu basizwe n'abari imbere umunota n'amasegonda 20

12:28

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Abasiganwa 10 bari imbere basize igikundi iminota ibiri

Itsinda ririmo; Trarieux Julien, Valens Ndayisenga, Mugisha Samuel, REGUIGUI Youcef, Yakob Debesay, Mulueberhan Henok, Przemyslaw Kasperkiewicz, Pablo Torres Muiño na Joonas Henttala wa Team Novo Nordisk bamaze gusiga igikundi kirimo Kudus iminota ibiri

12:17

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Merhawi Kudus wambaye umwenda w'umuhondo ari mu gikundi aratuje

Abakinnyi batatu bari imbere ku rutonde rusange; Merhawi Kudus, Rein Taaramae na Matteo Badialatti bari mu gikundi. Baracungana n'ibilometero bya nyuma ngo hatagira ubasiga iminota myinshi

12:13

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

NTIBISANZWE: Abasiganwa bamanutse Shyorongi ku muvuduko ukomeye

Abasiganwa bamanutse Shyorongi basesekaye Nyabugogo. Umuvuduko bamanukanye ni 90Km/h.

12:04

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Areruya Joseph utarahiriwe muri iri siganwa aratanga icyizere uyu munsi

Inshuro zose yagerageje gucomoka mu bandi ntabwo yahirwaga n'ibilometero bya nyuma by'uduce twa Tour du Rwanda uyu mwaka. Mbere yo gutangira agace k'uyu munsi yabwiye IGIHE ko byanze bikunze ashaka kwegukana agace k'uyu munsi.

Uyu musore w'imyaka 23 uvuka i Kayonza ukinira Delko Marseille Provence yo mu Bufaransa yagize ati: ''Aka gace ndakazi 2017 nabaye uwa kabiri nahagereye rimwe na Eyob twakinanaga. Ibanga ryako ndarizi kandi nizeye kwitwara neza uyu munsi.''

11:58

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Amafoto y'igikundi muri Rulindo

11:56

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Rulindo- Nkuko bisanzwe abafana ni benshi ku mihanda

Isiganwa rya Tour du Rwanda niryo rya mbere muri Afurika rirebwa n'abantu benshi. Habarurwa abantu basaga miliyoni ebyiri bareba iri siganwa ku mihanda.Rulindo ho abanyeshuri n'abarimu babo bategereje kureba uhagera ari imbere

11:52

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Intera hagati y'abari imbere n'igikundi ikomeje kwiyongera

Abasiganwa bari imbere biyongereyeho Mulueberhan ukinira ikipe y'igihugu ya Erythree, barasatira umusozi wa Shyorongi bamanuka ku muvuduko ukomeye aho barenza 50km/h

11:41

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Abakinnyi 10 bacomotse mu gikundi. Batarimo Merhawi Kudus

Abasiganwa 56 bari kumwe mu gikundi, basizwe umunota umwe n'amasegonda 10 n'abasiganwa barimo Valens Ndayisenga na Mugisha Samuel na Rohan du Plooy wa Pro-Touch. Barasatira Tare na Gako ya Rulindo

11:17

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Isiganwa ryinjiye mu isaha ya kabiri, umuvuduko utangiye kwiyongera

Ubu umuvuduko abasiganwa bari kugenderaho ni 41Km/H

11:15

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Aho abari i Kigali bategerereza isiganwa uyu munsi

Abasiganwa nibamara kumanuka umusozi wa Shyorongi baranyura Nyabugogo banyure hepfo ya Gare bakomeze ku Kinamba, n'aho bita mu Kanogo no ku Mazi bakomeze Rwandex bazamukire ku muhanda unyura Zion Temple kwa Gitwaza uzamuka mu Gatenga, bakomeze i Nyanza ya Kicukiro berekeza i Bugesera

10:55

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Hailemichael Mulu atsindiye amanota yo mu musozi wa mbere w'iri siganwa

Umusozi wa Kivuruga abasiganwa barawurangije. Umunya-Ethiopia Hailemichael Mulu ukinira Dimension Data niwe uharenze ari imbere. Ari kumwe na Mugisha Moise bahanganiye umwenda w'ahazamuka.

10:48

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

UNDI MUKINNYI ASEZEYE MU ISIGANWA

Bazamuka umusozi wa Kivuruga, wa mbere w'agace k'uyu munsi, Umunya-Kenya Kipmboi Salim asezeye mu isiganwa bamushyira mu modoka y'ikipe ye. Uyu mukinnyi w'imyaka 21 yakoze impanuka mu gace ka kabiri ka Tour du Rwanda ariko arihangana akomeza gusiganwa, ariko kurisoza biranze

10:27

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Abagerageje gucomoka igikundi gihise kibafata

James Fourie ukinira Pro-Touch yo muri Afurika y'epfo na Ruberwa Jean bagerageje gucomoka mu gikundi ariko itsinda ry'abakinnyi bakomoka muri Erythree bahise bakoresha imbaraga nyinshi barabashyikira. Barenze umugezi wa Mukungwa

10:11

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Icyayi cy'u Rwanda ni izimano rya mu gitondo ku bitabiriye Tour du Rwanda

Abakozi ba NAEB mu ishami ry'icyayi bazinduka bazimanira abitabiriye icyayi cy'u Rwanda cyahogoje amahanga. Abakinnyi, abatoza, abakomiseri (commisaire) n'abakunzi b'umukino wo gusiganwa ku magare babanza kugisoma mbere yo gutangira buri gace

10:06

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Agace ka Gatandatu ka Tour du Rwanda karatangiye

Imbere y'isoko rya Musanze niho abasiganwa 67 bahagurutse berekeza i Nyamata ya Bugesera. Aba ntabwo barimo Hakiruwizeye Samuel na Jean Claude Uwizeye basezeye mu isiganwa

09:35

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Ni inshuro ya kabiri Tour du Rwanda igiye gusorezwa i Nyamata



Mu mateka ya Tour du Rwanda, agace kasorejwe i Nyamata mu Bugesera inshuro imwe gusa, kegukanwa na Eyob Metkel wahagereye rimwe na Areruya Joseph, bakiniraga Team Dimension Data, yaje no kwegukana isiganwa ry’uwo mwaka.


Amafoto y'uko byari bimeze mu 2017

09:34

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Imiterere y’agace ka Gatandatu ka Tour du Rwanda 2019

Aka gace kagizwe n’imisozi ine itangirwaho amanota y’ahazamuka. Mu Kivuguruga, umusozi wa Gako wo muri Rulindo, umusozi wa Nyanza ya Kicukiro no mu Karumuna.

Kuko harimo imihanda myinshi imanuka, impuzandengo y’umuvuduko w’iri siganwa rihaguruka saa 10 :00 rigasozwa saa 13 :10 byitezwe ko uba ari 42Km/h.
Byitezwe ko abakinnyi bari burenge i Nyanza ya Kicukiro bari imbere aribo baza kwegukana agace k’uyu munsi.

09:33

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Abatuye Umujyi wa Kigali bagiye kongera kubona Tour du Rwanda

Abasiganwa barahaguruka i Musanze basoreze i Nyamata banyuze mu Mujyi wa Kigali. Hitezwe ibihumbi by’abakorera mu duce twa Nyabugogo no mu Mujyi rwagati ku mihanda baza kwirebera igare nyuma y’iminsi itanu rizenguruka izindi ntara.

09:33

Kuwa gatanu, 01.03.2019

Abakurikira Tour du Rwanda kuri IGIHE mwaramutse!


Uyu munsi harakinwa agace ka Gatandatu k’isiganwa mpuzamahanga rizenguruka u Rwanda ku magare, Tour du Rwanda 2019, gahaguruka i Musanze kagasorezwa i Nyamata mu Karere ka Bugesera ku ntera y’ibilometero 121.1.
